      • getSatisfactionReport

        public java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Object> getSatisfactionReport(java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Object> arr)
                                                            throws java.lang.Exception
        Description copied from interface: ISatisfactionReportController

        A function that performs a query to check whether the requested report exists in the database. If it does return the above report another produces it (if it is in the correct date range)

        Specified by:
        getSatisfactionReport in interface ISatisfactionReportController
        Parameters:
        arr - - the arguments that send from the client which we used to make the query from the DB arr is arraylist because we can send only one argument so all the requested arguments are collected into this arraylist.
        Returns:
        The returned value is an arraylist of object that the client parsing into the requested type of data.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - -if something went wrong with the ask from the DB

      • produceSatisfactionReport

        public java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Object> produceSatisfactionReport(java.time.LocalDate date,
                                                                       java.math.BigInteger storeID)
                                                                throws java.lang.Exception
        Description copied from interface: ISatisfactionReportController

        TThis function receives details if the report does not exist and produces it by receiving the relevant data from the DB in this case all surveys data. Then calculates the average scores that customers have given the store and returns them.

        Specified by:
        produceSatisfactionReport in interface ISatisfactionReportController
        Parameters:
        date - - the end of the requested quarter date
        storeID - - the storeId of the store we want to check
        Returns:
        The returned value is an ArrayList of object that the client parsing into the requested type of data.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - -because this function calls to analyzeComplaints

        Returns:

        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - - if there is no data that returns from the server (DB)

      • add

        public java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Object> add(java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Object> arr)
                                          throws java.lang.Exception
        Description copied from class: ParentController
        Will add the object to the DataBase
        Specified by:
        add in interface ISatisfactionReportController
        Specified by:
        add in class ParentController
        Parameters:
        arr - always will contain 2 Objects: The first one (get(0)) is the Object to add to the DataBase (Depend on the Controller) The second one (get(1)) is Boolean that indicates if we want to get the new Object's id
        Returns:
        ArrayList that contains the answer: if the Boolean=true, will contain the BigInteger id else, will contain true
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception
